name: run_samseg
description: SAMSEG (Sequence Adaptive Multimodal SEGmentation) is a tool for automated segmentation of brain MRI data.

inputs.name: Output Directory
inputs.description: Target directory for output.

inputs.name: Input Image Files
inputs.description: Input image(s) for segmentation.

inputs.name: Input Image Mode
inputs.description: Output basenames for the input image mode.

inputs.name: Number of Threads
inputs.description: Number of threads to use.

inputs.name: Registration Only
inputs.description: Only perform initial affine registration.

inputs.name: Registration File
inputs.description: Skip initial affine registration and read transform from file.

inputs.name: Initial Registration File
inputs.description: Initial affine registration.

inputs.name: Atlas Directory
inputs.description: Point to an alternative atlas directory.

inputs.name: GMM File
inputs.description: Point to an alternative GMM file.

inputs.name: Ignore Unknown
inputs.description: Ignore final priors corresponding to unknown class.

inputs.name: Options File
inputs.description: Override advanced options via a JSON file.

inputs.name: Pallidum Separate
inputs.description: Move pallidum outside of global white matter class.

inputs.name: Mesh Stiffness
inputs.description: Override mesh stiffness.

inputs.name: Smooth WM Cortex Priors
inputs.description: Sigma value to smooth the WM and cortex atlas priors.

inputs.name: Bias Field Smoothing Kernel
inputs.description: Distance in mm of sinc function center to first zero crossing.

inputs.name: Enable Lesion Segmentation
inputs.description: Enable lesion segmentation (requires tensorflow).

inputs.name: Lesion Threshold
inputs.description: Lesion threshold for final segmentation.

inputs.name: Number of Samples
inputs.description: Number of samples for lesion segmentation.

inputs.name: Burn-in Samples
inputs.description: Number of burn-in samples for lesion segmentation.

inputs.name: Lesion Pseudo Samples
inputs.description: Lesion pseudo samples mean and variance.

inputs.name: Lesion Ratio
inputs.description: Lesion ratio.

inputs.name: Lesion Mask Structure
inputs.description: Intensity mask brain structure.

inputs.name: Lesion Mask Pattern
inputs.description: Lesion mask pattern for each input volume.

inputs.name: Random Seed
inputs.description: Random seed.

inputs.name: Dissection Photo
inputs.description: Specify hemispheres: left, right, or both.

inputs.name: Save History
inputs.description: Save history of segmentation.

inputs.name: Save Posteriors
inputs.description: Save posterior volumes.

inputs.name: Save Probabilities
inputs.description: Save modal class probabilities.

inputs.name: Show Figures
inputs.description: Show figures during run.

inputs.name: Save Mesh
inputs.description: Save final mesh in template space.

inputs.name: Save Warp
inputs.description: Save image->template warp field.

inputs.name: Movie Mode
inputs.description: Show history as controlled time sequence.

author: FreeSurfer Developers
